Sentencas: Biogas is a variable mixture of methane, carbon dioxide and other gases.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is a renewable resource which comes from numerous sources of plant and animal matter.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) can directly use clean synthesized biogas as fuel.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, trace impurities, such as H2S, Cl-2 and F-2 in real biogas can cause degradation in cell performance.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this research, both uncoated and coated Ni-YSZ anode-supported cells were exposed to three different compositions of synthesized biogases (syn-biogas) with 20 ppm H2S under a constant current load at 750-850 degrees C and their performance was evaluated periodically using standard electrochemical methods.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Postmortem analysis of the SOFC anode was performed using X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that H2S causes severe electrochemical degradation of the cell when operating on biogas, leading to both complete electrochemical and mechanical failure.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-CeO2 coated cell showed excellent stability during CH4 reforming and some tolerance to H2S contamination.
Titulo: Tolerance tests of H2S-laden biogas fuel on solid oxide fuel cells
